help_outline On Jekyll with Paper Theme
September 13th, 2015

A Gentle Theme

A new material design utilising theme for your Jekyll blog. Built on Material Design Lite.

##battery_charging_full Batteries Included

There are many cool features bundled with Paper such as:

  • Full Github Pages support.
  • Responsive layout.
  • Dynamic search with jekyll-search.
  • Post tags and categories.
  • Autor Github, Twitter, bio.
  • Pagination.
  • Syntax highlighting with pygments.
  • Disqus comments.
Read more
September 13th, 2015

Install

Easiest way of getting Paper work is forking.

  • Fork the repo.
  • Rename forked repo as username.github.io.
  • Set up blog by editing _config.yml.
  • Enjoy.
